Articles.Content: Not accusing the poster above you of cheating? Even Bill Clinton thinks that is cheating. Real posters make absurd accusations of cheating.

Calling me a cheater? CHEATER! I can't be a cheater, my name says i'm super!

/boot

:Welcome to GLaDOS. Please enter command.

/killallhumans

:Unknown command.

/bitemyshinymetalass

:Firing up CHEETERLazah#34, please wait while next poster is given a reason to call me a cheater.....

Edited May 25, 2014 by Souper
Using lazahs? Cheating! Your lazahs are deflected by my showing the world your cheating! Real players only use Lasers!
You use Lasers? CHEATER! Normal players use bullets.
Bullets? Only if you want your gun to win the game for you, cheater. Good players use harsh language.
one post away from 2,200? Cheater! Real players never have 2,199 posts!

I don't care, i'l still use cheats.

Like Noclip. WHEEEE!
What, attempting to derail the thread? Cheating! Non-cheaters always follow the game rules and actually play the game!
WHAT'S THIS? Calling me a cheater when i wasn't trying to derail the thread? CHEATER! I just wanna noclip into your room and keeel yuuu!
Ribbons?!?!?! Cheaters everywhere!!!
A location that can't be found on google? What is this witchcraft? HAAAAAAAAXXX!111!!!!11!!!
Looking up locations in Google? I guess you could do that, if you have no self respect when it comes to cheating. Real stalkers follow people in an unmarked van to find their location.
[ERROR: TEXT NOT FOUND]? Cheating!
Wow sir, you really have no respect for this game.....cheater! Real players always respect the game!
Real players don't expect from other players to have respect for anything. CHEATER
BOLD CAPS? Cheater!
Using invisi-text to hide your accusation? CHEATER!

Fancy fonts? Cheating. Pros think in ASCII.

Edit: Being a ninja? Cheating. Considerate posters wait for everyone else to post first.

What? Expecting posters to be considerate? How DARE you!? You cheater! Real players know that posters can be however considerate, or inconsiderate they want!

(Just kidding hehehe no seriously be considerate you cheaters!)
Not being able to read this without selecting it? CHEATER!
Doubting my ability to tilt my screen back, therefor revealing your notactuallyinvisible text? Cheater! All non-cheaters never doubt other players' abilities!
Replying to a forum game? CHEATERS! ALL OF YOU!

Irony?

You don't even deserve being called a cheater, cheater!

hurray for irony
Calling me a cheater after saying I don't deserve to be a cheater? Cheater!
Marmarmarmarmarmar?!! MAR! Mar mar mar!
